Key Match Events: Baghdad Bounedjah gave Algeria the lead with a clinical finish after 18 minutes.
Mabululu equalized for Angola in the 65th minute after his penalty hit the bar.
Algeria had a goal disallowed for offside after a VAR review.
Post-Match Reflections: Algeria are looking to avoid a similar fate to 2022 when they entered as defending champions but crashed out in the group stages after failing to win a game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Angola drew level in the 65th minute when Mabululu was brought down by Nabil Bentaleb in the box.
Riyad Mahrez was a constant threat at set-plays for Algeria.
Others: The match was part of Group D at the Africa Cup of Nations.
